page.title: 04SHINTY KINLOCHSHIEL
page.content:
Shinty is a very old game. Shinty is played by 12 players on each side including the goalie. The game is played with sticks called Shinty sticks or Caman in Gaelic. The sticks are used to hit a leather ball stuffed with cork. The local game is played at Kirkton used by Kinlochshiel. The players wear sweaters,socks and
shorts in red and white. Boots must be free from metal plates and there should be no protruding spikes or nails. The local team is called Kinlochshiel because the teams come from Kintail, Lochalsh and Shiel. Kinlochshiel won the league cup this year 1985.
